variants.name: fur_black
variants.description: This variant, with its jet-black fur, is often found in the darkest corners of the labyrinth, striking fear with its mere presence.

variants.name: fur_brown
variants.description: Rich brown fur covers this minotaur, perfect camouflage in the deep forests where it guards ancient treasures.

variants.name: fur_tan
variants.description: Adapted to arid environments, this minotaur with sandy tan fur can survive in harsh desert conditions without water for days.

variants.name: fur_copper
variants.description: Copper fur gives this minotaur an unusual reflective quality, which it uses to dazzle and confuse its opponents in battle.

variants.name: fur_gold
variants.description: This rare gold-furred minotaur is often considered a majestic creature, its presence said to bring prosperity to those worthy of its respect.

variants.name: fur_grey
variants.description: With fur as grey as storm clouds, this minotaur is capable of summoning tempests and thunder with a bellow of its mighty roar.

variants.name: fur_white
variants.description: This pure white minotaur is a rare genetic marvel, striking in appearance and possessing a mystical presence that can calm even the most turbulent spirits.

variants.name: light
variants.description: This minotaur variant, with fur that glows softly in the dark, serves as a beacon to lost travelers trying to navigate treacherous terrains.

variants.name: amber
variants.description: With fur like polished amber, this minotaur can harness the power of the sun to create dazzling displays of light that blind its foes.

variants.name: olive
variants.description: This minotaur, with deep olive fur, is a guardian of ancient groves and natural forests, blending perfectly into the foliage.

variants.name: taupe
variants.description: The taupe fur of this minotaur offers perfect camouflage in mountainous and rocky environments, making it a stealthy predator.

variants.name: bronze
variants.description: This minotaur's bronze fur shimmers in battle, inspiring awe and fear in equal measure among its foes.

variants.name: brown
variants.description: Native to highland regions, this brown-furred minotaur is known for its incredible strength and endurance.

variants.name: black
variants.description: The black fur of this minotaur absorbs light, allowing it to move unseen at night and strike without warning.

variants.name: lavender
variants.description: This minotaur, with its unusual lavender fur, is said to have psychic abilities, often seen leading herds with its mental prowess.

variants.name: blue
variants.description: This blue-furred minotaur is often found near the sea, where it uses its might to protect coastal villages from threats.

variants.name: zombie_green
variants.description: A terrifying sight, this green-furred minotaur has returned from the dead, its body hosting a myriad of dark magics.

variants.name: green
variants.description: With fur as green as the emerald leaves of the oldest trees, this minotaur is a natural protector of the forest.

variants.name: pale_green
variants.description: This pale green minotaur is wise beyond its years, often sought for its knowledge of ancient herbal remedies and natural magic.

variants.name: bright_green
variants.description: Radiating vitality, this brightly colored green minotaur can regenerate its wounds and has a deep connection to the life force of the earth.

variants.name: dark_green
variants.description: This dark green minotaur is a guardian of sacred groves, blending into the shadows of the trees to protect its realm from intruders.

variants.name: zombie
variants.description: Once a mighty warrior, this minotaur has been resurrected through forbidden necromancy, now serving as a grim sentinel of the underworld.
